About this Guide

This document provides information about configuring and maintaining service provider network elements using the Parallel Wireless Element Management System (PW EMS) product. It assumes you have already installed the product software. For details on installation, see the Software Installation and Upgrade Guide.

PW EMS provides a web-based graphical user interface (GUI) for operators to configure, manage, secure, and monitor the following network elements:

  • HetNet Gateway (HNG)
  • Remote Radio Head (RRH)
  • Converged Wireless System (CWS) is supported when connected to the vBBU only.
  • Virtual Baseband Unit (vBBU)
  • Conventions
  • Available Documentation
  • Contact Parallel Wireless
